title: Windows 10 version 21H2 is now generally available
content:
Microsoft has quietly announced that Windows 10 version 21H2 – which made its debut back in November – is now ready for broad deployment. This essentially means that anyone checking for updates will now be able to find and install this version on their machine. The main audience for Windows 10 version 21H2 are business

The post Windows 10 version 21H2 is now generally available appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Microsoft has announced that Windows 10 version 21H2 is now generally available, meaning anyone can get it by checking for updates.
